unnormalised: Athlete biographies are my fav! Just finished reading about Milkha Singh, the "Flying Sikh". Amazing story! Remember watching "Bhaag Milkha Bhaag" – what a film!
normalised: Athlete biographies are my favourite! Just finished reading about Milkha Singh, the "Flying Sikh". Amazing story! Remember watching "Bhaag Milkha Bhaag" – what a film!

unnormalised: Makes you so proud. Inspiring to see someone from a small village in Punjab reach such heights.
normalised: Makes you so proud. Inspiring to see someone from a small village in Punjab reach such heights.

unnormalised: Next up, maybe Sachin Tendulkar's story? Or someone from the National Sports University.
normalised: Next up, maybe Sachin Tendulkar's story? Or someone from the N A S U.
